detaileddescription.para: Enums for types needed by the scene manager.
The default texture for a mesh. This texture is used upon initializing a mesh so that it can be rendered without error.
Initialization method for the default texture.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the default texture was initialized properly, FALSE if not.

detaileddescription.para: Get the default texture used by freshly loaded models.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to the default model texture

detaileddescription.para: Contains all visual elements to a scene such as meshes, textures, texture atlases, shaders, etc.
